thread.title: Stocks to watch at noon on Thursday
thread.title_full: Stocks to watch at noon on Thursday

title: Stocks to watch at noon on Thursday
text:
Stocks to watch at noon on Thursday AAP â€“ 35 minutes ago 
Stocks to watch on the Australian stock exchange at noon on Thursday: 
ANZ - ANZ BANKING GROUP - in a trading halt, last traded at $32.58 
ANZ is poised to launch a $3 billion capital raising in response to regulatory moves forcing major lenders to provide an extra buffer for their home loan books. 
DOW - DOWNER EDI - down 41.5 cents, or 9.06 per cent, at $4.165 
SYDNEY, Aug 6 AAP - Engineering group Downer EDI has warned of further hits over the next 12 months after its full year profit for 2014/15 declined 2.7 per cent following a big fall in mining revenue. 
KMD - KATHMANDU - up 3.75 cents, or 2.48 per cent, at $1.5475 
Kathmandu directors have rejected a "highly opportunistic" hostile takeover offer from Briscoe Group, which they say is timed to exploit the company's recent share price struggles. 
SGH - SLATER & GORDON - down 11.00 cents, or 3.36 per cent, at $3.16 
Shares in Slater and Gordon have slumped by nearly 20 per cent in early trade amid more worries about its UK business.
